mapper.select: SELECT nft.id AS nftId, nft.name AS nftName, nft.description AS nftDescription, nft.image_url AS nftImage, os.issue_count AS issueCount, os.circulate_count AS circulationCount, ni.instance_number AS instanceNumber, ni.price AS instancePrice, ni.instance_id AS instanceId FROM nfts nft JOIN official_sales os ON nft.id = os.nft_id JOIN nft_instances ni ON nft.id = ni.nft_id WHERE nft.id = #{nftId} AND ni.instance_number = #{instanceNumber}
